com.github.lucbui.gba.gfx

Class GBATileMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.lucbui.gba.gfx.GBATileMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GBAGraphic, java.io.Serializable

    public class GBATileMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements GBAGraphic, java.io.Serializable
    Represents the combination of Tiles and their metadata to create a full image.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getRowForMetadata

        protected int[] getRowForMetadata(GBATile tile,
                                  GBAMapTileMetadata metadata,
                                  int y)
        Gets a row from a tile, applying the relevant flipping and palette swapping.
        Parameters:
        tile - The tile to retrieve from.
        metadata - The metadata to use during retrieval
        y - The Y position to read from (irrespective of the flip).
        Returns:
        The specified row.

      • modify

        public GBATileMap.Creator modify()
        Modify this GBATileMap This returns a Creator which modifies the current tilemap. The tilemap returned from the creator is an all-new tilemap based on this one.
        Returns:
        A creator to modify this tilemap.
